Guidelines MD

A collection of clinical practice guidelines from professional organizations, curated by doctors, for doctors

Aging

  • As of today, there is no cure to aging
  • Aging is a condition that gets old fast
  • Time heals all wounds; but time doesn’t heal aging; therefore, aging is not a wound

Source: My lived experience

Clinical practice guidelines should not guide patient care alone. See our full disclaimer.
